import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import products from './Prodcard'; import getproductsCB from '../../api/api' const ProdScreen = (props) => { console.log(props) console.log(props.match.params.id) // const products = products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); const [state, setstate] = React.useState([]) let table = [] const ActiveFunction = async () => { const result = await getproductsCB(); const CB = JSON.parse(result) setstate(CB.Table) console.log(table) return [table] } React.useEffect(() => { ActiveFunction() }, []) return (
{/*
Back to result
  • {products.name}
  • {products.rating} Stars ({products.numReviews}) Reviews)
  • Price: $ {products.prix}
  • Description:
    {products.description}
  • Price:$$ {products.prix}
  • Status: {products.status}
  • Qty:{" "} {products.prix}
*/}
); } export default ProdScreen
